channel.title: RovaScape - 2012 - [24/7] - 4 YEARS UPTIME! - NEED CORE MEMBERS
channel.description:
[center] [ul][list][center][url=http://rovascape.info][img]http://i.imgur.com/IUYis.png[/img][/url][/center]
[hr]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/PleUn.png[/img] RovaScape started back in 2007-2008. RovaScape still has the same owner since then. The server has been running for 4-5 years! RovaScape use to have lots of players in it's prime with around 200 players on at one time. We got our website suspended and we lost a lot of our player base. We need new players to come into our community knowing that they are going to join a server with not a lot of players on. We need people to join that are willing to make our community a better place and be a core member of it as well.
[hr]
[url=http://rovascape.info/index.php/page,downloads.html][img]http://i.imgur.com/7UB7g.png[/img][/url] [url=http://rovascape.info/index.php/page,webclient.html][img]http://i.imgur.com/UKk4K.png[/img][/url] | [url=http://rovascape.info/webclient.jar][img]http://i.imgur.com/Mqthm.png[/img][/url]
[hr]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/csk92.png[/img]
Features [list][li]100% Highscores[/li] [li]Rewarding Voting System[/li] [li]Automated Donation System[/li] [li]Amazing Community Forums[/li] [li]Flawless Combat[/li] [li]Updated Hitsplats[/li] [li]Ancients and Lunar[/li] [li]Great NPC Combat[/li] [li]All Combat Skills[/li] [li]All skills work except the ones below.[/li] [li]Dungeoneering[/li] [li]Construction[/li] [li]Tormented Demons[/li] [li]Godwars[/li] [li]King Black Dragon[/li] [li]Dagonnath Kings[/li] [li]Corporal Beast[/li] [li]Avatar of Destruction[/li] [li]Nex (Under Construction[/li] [li]Fun Minigames[/li] [li]1 Wave Fight Cave[/li] [li]Voting and Donating Store[/li] [li]Donator Tab[/li] [li]Working Curses[/li] [li]4 Donator ranks depending on donation.[/li] [li]Helping staff members.[/li][/list]
[hr]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/y6VmT.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5IFBK.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pf2ZH.png[/img]
[hr]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lU1C2.png[/img]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R7-YFwoZK6Q&feature=plcp[/youtube]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TqH3RIvlzp8&feature=player_embedded#![/youtube][/center][/list][/ul]
